[@thirdweb-dev/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [Token](./sdk.token.md)

## Token class

Create a standard crypto token or crypto currency.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Token extends Erc20<TokenERC20> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Erc20&lt;TokenERC20&gt;

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const token = sdk.getToken("{{contract_address}}");
```
